patthana15.4:4.1: Hetuṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.4:5.1: Nahetuṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naanupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.4:6.1: Hetuṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
